description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Crisis of the Revolution, being the story of Arnold and André now for the first time collected from all sources, and illustrated with views of all places identified with it ... Illustrations from original photographs by E. S. Bennett, etc" Author: ABBATT, William. Contributor: ANDRÉ, John - Major Contributor: ARNOLD, Benedict. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9603.g.14." Page: 179 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1899 Publisher: W. Abbatt Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000003131 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
